name: disjeqd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wb(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(c1)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wdisjALTV(c0), wdisjALTV(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

comment: Equality theorem for disjoints, deduction version. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 22-Sep-2021.)
